1455410.name: Sparks - Episode One
1455410.description:
A cartoon style and happy non-violent arcade racing game. You will drive, slide, enjoy the scenery and have a nice time. Sparks is a casual game with a bright and upbeat graphics and music. You can play it for the racing or you can play it just to relax.



The game isn't violent and is therefore suitable for all audiences. It has simple controls, good selection of cars and small in number but detailed, varied and spacious tracks to have fun in.

Key Features

  • Small arcade racing game
  • Beautiful and spacious low-poly world
  • Non-violent and family friendly
  • Eight interesting and varied vehicles to choose from
  • Three beautiful and spacious low-poly tracks, each track has an alternate version that apears after you beat all tracks on hard difficulty, and each track has mirror mode that appears after beating all alternate tracks on hard
  • Play the tracks individually or as a cup
  • Three difficulty levels
  • Nice and uplifting music

Note From Developer

This is not your standard gaming experience. It is a small project made by only one person. The game is primarily envisioned as a short, not too competitive, arcade racing.




You can race, but you can also just drive around, and enjoy detailed and spacious scenery while listening uplifting music. If you enjoy it, please do share, drop me a line, it will make my day!
